QuestData.Title: They Came From the Sea
QuestData.Description: You're looking for Prince Farondis?$b$b<The ghostly elf narrows her eyes warily.>$b$bI can take you to Farondis... but first things first. These naga attacked suddenly. They take orders from one called Zarrin, in the low hills to the west.$b$bHelp me take Zarrin's head, and you'll have my ear.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay him and the naga he commands!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Head of Fathom-Commander Zarrin, and slay $2oa of his naga troops.
QuestData.RewardText: <Idri stares at the ugly head.>$b$bYes, that's him.
